title: Your favorite champion builds your new house.
body:
How sturdy is it, and is it even livable?

{{champion:59}}  just made a crater and threw some furniture inside...

replies.body: {{champion:117}} I don't want to talk about it...
It's outrageous. Truly, truly outrageous. {{champion:44}}
i'd have a sand palace {{champion:268}}
{{champion:4}}  It's a house of cards. Collapses when a gentle breeze hits it.

{{champion:41}}  built me this ship and... Uh oh, a leak.

Oh man...


OH GOD


FWRLWRLWRLWRLWRL


Moral of the story: Pirates are made to steal ships, not build them.

I was about to walk in it but it just suddenly laughed, bitch-slapped me, and then went up in smoke.

Fuck you Wukong.
{{champion:89}} Too many windows and I have sunburn now

jayce builds me a good techno-house. im fine with it :D. then it turns to a car when i press R .


zed builds me a shadow house. yep. when i go inside i realize its just a shadow
{{champion:21}} "Why would I MAKE something when I can just steal it? And why would you want me to take over a house when I could steal a ship?"
{{champion:31}}  I know live inside Cho, At least its warm

{{champion:112}} 

Metal is perfection...
{{champion:121}} "Change is good..." Yes Kha' I agree, but I would like for my house to not be constantly changing. What's it doing now?  {{item:3175}} "Evolving"

{{champion:107}}  would just build me a house of dead things.

{{champion:115}}  would blow up the house.

{{champion:42}}  might actually build me a house...and cover it in explosives and miniguns. Thanks, Corki.
{{champion:120}}   hmm. a ghostly barn. as long is it dont smell like a horse im fine. ive slept on hay

{{champion:54}}  would make the most epic house ever... So glad he is my current favorite!
Sturdy, functional, earthy, but a little bit hard and uncomfortable at times.
Hm sounds like your caught between a rock and another rock.....quite the pickle you have there, eh?

{{champion:61}} , Builds me the Aperture Science labs, and makes me do some testing.

{{champion:74}} , Everything is HIGHLY efficient.
{{champion:201}} I have difficulties opening my door.
{{champion:29}} Well... I'm dead...
{{champion:27}}   Well, the lab is cool and all, but having to wear a gas mask in side gets old. Still have at least one layer of skin left though. That's good.
{{champion:105}} Perfectly stable but unlivable due to the fact that its underwater.
Me and {{champion:106}} share a den together. It's mighty cold at times but voli harnesses lightning to start me fires, and when i am hungry i press q and he fetches us an adc to eat.
{{champion:21}}   I AM NOT A PIRATE . I'M A BOUNTY HUNTER  OKKKKKK

hhhhhhmmmmmmm a house heyyy,let me ask 
me:hi{{champion:31}} would u build me house?
{{champion:31}} :........OHAMYAYAMYAMYAM(ulted on me)
okay next champ
me:hi {{champion:86}} would u build me a house?
{{champion:86}} :DEEMACIAAAA
sigh
me:hey {{champion:157}} would u build me a house?
{{champion:157}} :dude if i could build a house then why would i be a wonderer?
me:okay nvm then
me:{{champion:412}} can u build me house?
{{champion:412}} :i already have 
me:REALLY?NI  KIDDING?
{{champion:412}} :yes and u wont be alone and will always be with me(while patting his lantern)
me:oh i see very good,oh no look at the time i have to go its getting late and i've parked my car in a bad place see ya later(runs like hell)

yasuo isn't a wanderer because he is homeless.  In his lore, he was given the responsibility to protect one of the village elders.  Yasuo got bored, went to fight.  When he returned the elder was dead and he was accused of murdering the elder.  Now ionia hates him and he must prove his honor by finding the one that killed the village elder.
He can't go back to his house. That makes him homeless.
{{champion:222}} -Yeah Sure, I totally have a House
{{champion:222}} Where'd it go?  I coulda swore there was a house where this smoking crater is.
Well, i'm not getting near any house Shaco made.
{{champion:39}}
{{champion:111}} I don't think I'll survive in this house. There'll probably be cosmic horrors in the fridge.
I hope your name isn't Dana Barret.
{{champion:91}} a lair in the sewers to hide the bodies and interogate traitors.
{{champion:126}} Well.. it'd be high tech.. and solid build.. I'm good.

Thanks for the house {{champion:119}}, But why are there pictures of you on every wall?

{{champion:119}}: Man i'm good!

{{champion:60}}  Elise.. Dead things like decorations hanging everywhere D: Did I mention it's all the way up in a tree? With no ladder? Oh and the best part, sticking to literally EVERYTHING I touch.

well, i get a crater (due to {{champion:222}}  being the one to build it) or i have a bunch of knives ({{champion:55}} ) or i have waaay to much light, ( i hate you Lux ) last option is... uuhm, nvm, the crater might be better, because it would be solid ({{champion:429}} ) so, uuh, my houses all suck...
{{champion:84}}  threw down a shroud well atleast im invisble
{{champion:101}} ummmmm...

{{champion:143}} Thorny, but cozy! And the garden will just eat you alive!
{{champion:222}} "What house? Oh, *that was a house* I just blew up?"

{{champion:45}}  An evil space house, interesting
{{champion:35}}  Me: Where's the house?
Shaco: Look behind you!
Me: I don't see any house!
Shaco: The joke's on you!
Me. FUUUUUU
Shaco: Why so serious?
{{champion:55}}  The house is fine, but she shunpos and kills me
{{champion:103}} hmm.... She builds a strip club that is first-rate... Ty i guess? http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/dc/dcddb662b824896e6688f68840407d7968ef840585009ae70c8be28146616636.jpg
{{champion:412}}  All I have is a blue box... HOLY SH** IT'S THE TARDIS!

{{champion:27}}  
*COUGH**COUGH* Help me..... *cough* it was a trap... it twas a gas chamber *dies*
I don't need no house, I can just go through dimensions.{{champion:38}}
{{champion:44}}  That's a ton of gems... is that a diamond?
{{champion:117}} Like my house? It's purple!!! Well I just grabbed a few branches here and there...
